text:
Cruel Heart is obviously Chrysalis as she's pretty much the very definition of selfish. But it feels almost too obvious

Second candidate could also be Cadance given how her willingness to deprave the world of its love to protect her own. But the condition needs them to be full of malice.

Next up is Rarity who could be cruel enough to take the lives of so many ponies just to keep one by her side forever.

Big Mac might also be considered one as it seems like he's concerned about budding heads into Soarin and Braeburn's relationship

Like our masked assailant says, there's so many cruel ones to choose from. 


Though that also makes the Pure Heart really rare. Everyone's heart has been tainted one way or another but if we're going by love, a few candidates that come to mind are:

Trixie whose love for Twilight never wavered. Getting there was a bumpy road sure, but nothing really tainted their love

AppleBottom and Care Package. As messed up as they are, a blossoming love is still rather pure in its own way. But being untouched by evil hooves rules them out considering AppleBottom's parents.

Luna's love for her sister could also be considered untainted. Though whether the masked assailant would go after someone as powerful as her is unknown.

Flawless could work given how little she's been in the world.

replies.text:
I have a small feeling it could be Opaline since in Tamers‚Äô Universe, the G4 and G5 characters live in the same world.

Opaline is the definition of true evil, but unlike canon, I feel like Tamers could make her better than how she was originally.

replies.text: I really wanted to give Shiny an outfit that would contrast to Chrysalis‚Äôs black outfit, hence the ears being white. The reason they're shaped the way they are is mainly cause I thought it'd be cute & funny to give him really tall ears and still not be able to match Chrysalis's height. Twilight got them too simply because I wanted her outfit to parallel his since they‚Äôre siblings.
